content: Motivated Software Engineer with strong exposure to designing and developing various creative Android applications and coding efficient algorithms

Expertise in Core Java with strong practical understanding of Collections, Multithreading, Data Structures, Algorithms, Debugging & Exception Handling, and Object Oriented concepts like Inheritance, Abstraction, and Polymorphism.
Good knowledge of J2EE architecture, Servlets, JSP and proficient in applying Database Management concepts and operations like data manipulation and cursor control using JDBC API or PL/SQL.
Proficiency in database programming using SQL and PL/SQL.
Profoundly curious with a zeal to learn new technology and solve complex problems
Collaborator with leadership qualities, excellent communication skills and the ability to quickly adapt to new surroundings.

inside.title: Intern
content: Built a deep neural network, using Keras with TensorFlow backend, to find similarity between visual and thermal image and determine if they are of the same scene.
Used Amazon AWS instance to train the model with over 30,000 image pairs and achieved an accuracy of 77 percent. Used NumPy, Matplotlib and OpenCV for image processing.

inside.title: Intern
content: Developed an Android application for Hospital Management System and used SQLite as database
Developed modules like Sign-ins for Doctors, Patients and Admins, Appointment bookings and records.

inside.title: Synonym Cluster for GRE (Available on Play Store)
content: Designed an algorithm which forms clusters of similar words from the ones which the user has learnt.
Used Oxford Dictionaries API to fetch the data for the database.
Coded various other modules such as the ability to save progress, add notes, voice search, mark and filter words and google sign-in.
Used JUnit to write local unit tests and Espresso for UI testing.

inside.title: Outwit – Multiplayer Android Game
content: Used Google Firebase’s real-time database along with SQLite database to design an algorithm which allows players to create lobbies and play from anywhere while they are connected to the internet.
Designed and developed in-game chat feature within the game’s lobby.
Used Android fragments, custom views and animations to develop an intuitive user interface.

inside.title: Ten Minutes with Telusko
content: Collaborated with 2 members and developed a cs quiz app for Telusko Learning YouTube Channel.
